official_title: Journey to Understanding - Indigenous Peoples Engagement in Cancer Research Arizona (JUNIPER)
inclusion_criteria:
* Male or female adults >= 18 years of age
* Cancer patient undergoing active treatment or a cancer survivor
* Self-identify as Indigenous American
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unable to provide informed consent
* Individuals who are under 18 years of age
* Prisoners
